knimeNode.name: Exponential Smoothing
knimeNode.shortDescription: Smoothes time series data with an exponential window function

intro.p: The Exponential Smoothing Node smoothes a time series signal by convolving an exponential window function over the data. This procedure is often used for prediction of the next timestep. Uses the average value of the column as the initial timestep.
Please refer also to the Wikipedia description for further explanation.

tab.name: Options
tab.option: Strength of the smoothing: α=0 results in the average value at each timestep, α=1 shifts the data forward by one timestep. 0 < α < 1.
Whether to append a new column with the specified name or replace the chosen one.
